name: open-docker
title: Open Docker
description: A reliable fix to open the Docker Desktop dashboard, especially when it's already running but the window is hidden.
author: k4lok

commands.name: open-docker
commands.title: Open Docker
commands.subtitle: Open Docker Desktop
commands.description: Opens the Docker Desktop dashboard window.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
